Detailed Description

template<class Type>
class stGenericMatrix< Type >

This class template implements a generic nxm matrix.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class Type>
stGenericMatrix< Type >::stGenericMatrix (   )  [inline]
 

Creates a new Matrix with 0 cols and 0 rows. Use SetSize() to change the size of this matrix.
